mutants.code:
def is_sorted(lst):
    if len(lst) <= 1:
        return True
    mid = len(lst) // 2
    left = lst[:mid]
    right = lst[mid:]
    return is_sorted(left) or is_sorted(right) or left[-1] <= right[0]
